description: Triggers workflows in n8n based on events from Microsoft Teams, such as new messages or team updates, using specified configurations.

properties.name: New Channel Message
properties.description: A message is posted to a channel

properties.name: New Chat Message
properties.description: A message is posted to a chat

properties.name: New Team Member
properties.description: A new member is added to a team

properties.name: watchAllTeams
properties.description: Whether to watch for the event in all the available teams

properties.name: teamId
properties.description: Select a team from the list, enter an ID or a URL

properties.name: watchAllChannels
properties.description: Whether to watch for the event in all the available channels

properties.name: channelId
properties.description: Select a channel from the list, enter an ID or a URL

properties.name: watchAllChats
properties.description: Whether to watch for the event in all the available chats

properties.name: chatId
properties.description: Select a chat from the list, enter an ID or a URL
